CustomField.description: First day of the week in number format. Eg: [0 - Sunday, 1 - Monday, 2 - Tuesday, 3 - Wednesday, 4 - Thursday, 5 - Friday, 6 - Saturday]. Any value not listed in the example will be interpreted as 1.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: First day of the week in number format. Eg: [0 - Sunday, 1 - Monday, 2 - Tuesday, 3 - Wednesday, 4 - Thursday, 5 - Friday, 6 - Saturday]. Any value not listed in the example will be interpreted as 1.
CustomField.label: First Day Of The Week
